name: Gangster Cat 2
description:
In a world where cats live their lives like people a kitten gets lost from her brother and must become the top gangster in this kitty neighborhood to find him. That doesn't make sense? You don't make sense! Enjoy the game.

Credits:

Game Designer & Character Artist

Valhalla Villarreal
